title: How do we get more champion essence if we own all the champions to get mastery 6-7?
body:
Rito, pls teach me. I can't find it anywhere and I want to get masteries up.

What's the point of having us use champion essence or champion shards to raise our mastery to 6-7 if we can't actually even get them.

We can't get champion shards if we own the champions.
